english.segment1: Seven days old in the icu tonight. Little baby boy, they don't want to have to say goodbye. Your mother's on the phone. Your father's in the hall. Prayin' "God,save this life"
english.segment2: He sees you. He's near you. He knows your name. He knows your pain. He sees you and He loves you. He knows your name. He knows your name
english.segment3: Four doors down there's a man who just won't wake up. He crashed so hard. And the doctor's want to pull the plug. Your wife is by your side sayin' "Not tonight". Prayin' God will just show up.
english.segment4: He sees you. He's near you. He knows your name. He knows your pain. He sees you and He loves you. He knows your name. He knows your name
english.segment5: Maybe you're alone. In a corner of an empty house. Or maybe you're the one. No one notices in the crowd
english.segment6: He sees you. He's near you. He knows your name. He knows your pain. He sees you and He loves you. He knows your name. He knows your name
english.segment7: He knows your name. He knows your name
